name: Polaretti
summary:
Help the Polaretti Team use their superpowers to overcome the evil Minorca
An exciting adventure is starting in Polarettiland! Minorca is more evil than ever, and this time she is ready to do anything to steal all the fruit. Will the “Polaretti Team” succeed in overcoming her, thanks to your help and their superpowers? Join them in their world, and help make them stronger collecting all the fruit.
